name: 3 Dish Serving Board - Olive
description: Made from the beautiful wood of Oregon, with elegant dipping plates. Room for bread or crackers. Makes a great presentation.

name: Olive Dish - Set of 4
description: Have a dipping dish for each guest or display and taste four different varietals. Perfect for entertaining or dipping with just the family.

name: Pouring Spout
description: Weighted pour spout opens when you tilt the bottle and closes when the bottle is upright. A must have!

name: TAPI Pour Spout
description: Simple spout with drip and pour control. Made of food-safe plastic, so reusable.
